txt.en: Retrieved the broken hilt of Dúnachar
Narmeleth believes that baring the shattered hilt of Dúnachar before Mordirith will weaken the False King's will.

Golodir listens to your account of Narmeleth's plan, and nods.

'I took the broken hilt of Dúnachar with me when I buried my dear Lorniel, and by her grave it lies still. After her death we carried her as far  as we dared under the cover of darkness; she rests atop a hill on the northern slopes of Gorothlad.

'If the blade of Dúnachar will aid you in your fight against Mordirith, I give you my leave to retrieve it.'
Lorniel's grave is on the northern slopes of Gorothlad, south of Nan Gurth in Angmar.\n\nGolodir has given you the location of Dúnachar and has given you permission to retrieve it.
'I trust the hilt was not too difficult to find?'
Golodir is at Gath Forthnír in the northern reaches of Angmar.\n\nYou should return to Golodir with the broken hilt of Dúnachar.
'Lorniel's grave is on the northern slopes of Gorothlad, south of Nan Gurth.'
'With the hilt of Dúnachar, we will finally put an end to Mordirith.'
Retrieve the broken hilt of Dúnachar
Book 15, Chapter 11: A Father's Final Gift
